spirit:field.spirit:name: CHANNELS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Correction mode: channel on other lines.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: SINGLE
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: all pixels considered of the same channel

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: RCCC
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: 2 interleaved channels on lines with Red pixel, all pixels of the same

spirit:field.spirit:name: WEIGHT
spirit:field.spirit:description: Linear degree of replacement of pixels with a weighted average of current and both closest neighbours pixels

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: AVG
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: weighted average of two neighbours and current pixels

spirit:field.spirit:name: TOTAL_DARKLINES_OUTPUT
spirit:field.spirit:description: Total of darklines output by VT which includes dummies

spirit:field.spirit:name: RAM_OFFSET
spirit:field.spirit:description: RAM offset to use fot timing copy

spirit:field.spirit:name: ROM_OFFSET
spirit:field.spirit:description: ROM offset to use for timing section

spirit:field.spirit:name: FW_STALL
spirit:field.spirit:description: FW stall which stop all FW activities, infinite loop just before VT START

spirit:field.spirit:name: ANALOG_SETTINGS_BYPASS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Bypass of analog settings during streaming

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: AUTOTEST_15DEG
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: autotest phase increment used with 15 degree increment

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: AUTOTEST_30DEG
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: autotest phase increment used with 30 degree increment

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: DLL_OUTPUT

spirit:field.spirit:name: THSENS_STREAM_BYPASS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Bypass of Thermal sensor read operation during streaming

spirit:field.spirit:description: Bypass of Clock agility feature during streaming

spirit:field.spirit:name: ITOF_CLOCK_AGILITY_BYPASS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Bypass of Clock agility feature during streaming
